attributes.action: Fill the position of Prisons Minister as a matter of urgency
attributes.background: On 1st May 2019, Rory Stewart was promoted to Secretary of State for International Development. This has left us without a Prisons Minister at a time when overcrowding and short staffing is at its highest. We ask that the Government fill the position of Prisons Minister as a matter of urgency.

rejection.details:
We're sorry it's taken a while to moderate this petition. The role of Prisons Minister has now been filled by Robert Buckland MP.
